notenoughcreativity.title: Creative+ Inventory
notenoughcreativity.ability.nopickup.des: Completely prevent item pickup, to avoid inventory clutter.
notenoughcreativity.ability.attack.name: Instant Kill
notenoughcreativity.ability.attack.desc: Greatly increase your punch damage to get rid of pesky mobs without carrying a sword around. Also suppresses drops from killed mobs.
notenoughcreativity.ability.health.name: Allow Damage
notenoughcreativity.ability.health.desc: Enable damage and show your health bar. You still can't die except by the usual things that can kill Creative players.
notenoughcreativity.ability.instabreak.d: Disable the Creative break delay, allowing breaking blocks like a gold pick through netherrack.
notenoughcreativity.ability.pickswap.des: Move unique items into the upper inventory instead of deleting them when pickblocking with a held item. Also remove the first matching item from the upper inventory when pickblocking.
Make all blocks fullbright. Does not have the Night Vision fog effect.
notenoughcreativity.ability.noclip.name: No-Clip
